dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is commonly used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset consisting of 70,000 grayscale images of clothing items, with 10 categories. It serves as a drop-in replacement for the original MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST
